segment.source: How to Work with Reports
segment.target: How to Work with Reports

segment.source: How to Work with Reports
segment.target: How to Work with Reports

segment.source: How to Work with Reports
segment.target: How to Work with Reports

segment.source: The following functions can be used to work with MED-V reports:
segment.target: The following functions can be used to work with MED-V reports:

segment.source: Refreshing an existing report
segment.target: Refreshing an existing report

segment.source: Editing report parameters
segment.target: Editing report parameters

segment.source: Exporting a report to Microsoft Excel
segment.target: Exporting a report to Microsoft Excel

segment.source: Closing a report
segment.target: Closing a report

segment.source: Report results can be sorted by any column by clicking the appropriate column name.
segment.target: Report results can be sorted by any column by clicking the appropriate column name.

segment.source: The report results can be grouped by dragging a column header to the top of the report.
segment.target: The report results can be grouped by dragging a column header to the top of the report.

segment.source: Drag multiple column headers to group one column after another.
segment.target: Drag multiple column headers to group one column after another.

segment.source: How to Refresh an Existing Report
segment.target: How to Refresh an Existing Report

segment.source: To refresh an existing report
segment.target: To refresh an existing report

segment.source: Select the report to refresh.
segment.target: Select the report to refresh.

segment.source: On the management toolbar, click Refresh.
segment.target: On the management toolbar, click Refresh.

segment.source: The report is regenerated.
segment.target: The report is regenerated.

segment.source: How to Edit Report Parameters
segment.target: How to Edit Report Parameters

segment.source: To edit report parameters
segment.target: To edit report parameters

segment.source: Generate a report.
segment.target: Generate a report.

segment.source: On the management toolbar, click Edit report.
segment.target: On the management toolbar, click Edit report.

segment.source: The Report Parameters dialog box appears.
segment.target: The Report Parameters dialog box appears.

segment.source: In the Report Parameters dialog box, configure the parameters, and click OK.
segment.target: In the Report Parameters dialog box, configure the parameters, and click OK.

segment.source: The report is regenerated with the new parameters.
segment.target: The report is regenerated with the new parameters.

segment.source: How to Export a Report to Microsoft Excel
segment.target: How to Export a Report to Microsoft Excel

segment.source: To export a report to Microsoft Excel
segment.target: To export a report to Microsoft Excel

segment.source: Generate a report.
segment.target: Generate a report.

segment.source: On the management toolbar, click Export to Excel.
segment.target: On the management toolbar, click Export to Excel.

segment.source: In the Save Report dialog box, enter a name, and click Save.
segment.target: In the Save Report dialog box, enter a name, and click Save.

segment.source: The report is exported to Microsoft Excel.
segment.target: The report is exported to Microsoft Excel.

segment.source: How to Close a Report
segment.target: How to Close a Report

segment.source: To close a report
segment.target: To close a report

segment.source: Select the report to close.
segment.target: Select the report to close.

segment.source: On the management toolbar, click Close report.
segment.target: On the management toolbar, click Close report.

segment.source: The report closes.
segment.target: The report closes.
